entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is a person who is mentioned in the conversation between Harry and his friends. He is described as not stupid and having an opinion about Voldemort's return.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is a person who is mentioned in the text as being back, according to Percy. He is described as someone whose return would be headline news if reported in the Daily Prophet.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is having a conversation with his friends about Voldemort's return. He is described as not reading the Daily Prophet thoroughly and being defensive about it.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who is part of Harry's conversation with his friends. He mentions that Percy said the only evidence for Voldemort's return was Harry's word and something else.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who is part of Harry's conversation with his friends. She mentions that Percy takes the Daily Prophet seriously and asks Harry if he has been reading it thoroughly.

relationships.description: Percy believes that Voldemort is back, according to the conversation between Harry and his friends.
Harry reads the Daily Prophet, but not thoroughly, as mentioned in the text.
Hermione agrees with Percy's opinion that Voldemort is back and mentions that he takes the Daily Prophet seriously.
